com.google.android.exoplayer2.ext.vp9

Class VpxRenderer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.android.exoplayer2.ext.vp9.VpxRenderer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.opengl.GLSurfaceView.Renderer

    class VpxRenderer
extends java.lang.Object
implements android.opengl.GLSurfaceView.Renderer
    GLSurfaceView.Renderer implementation that can render YUV Frames returned by libvpx after decoding. It does the YUV to RGB color conversion in the Fragment Shader.

    • Method Detail

      • setFrame

        public void setFrame(VpxOutputBuffer outputBuffer)
        Set a frame to be rendered. This should be followed by a call to VpxVideoSurfaceView.requestRender() to actually render the frame.
        Parameters:
        outputBuffer - OutputBuffer containing the YUV Frame to be rendered
